title: The Dancing fleece
creator_credit: Frederick Wilson, Carl Koch and Crown Film Unit
brief_description: Illustrates, through the medium of ballet, the manufacturing processes for woollen fabrics. A wool worker visits a fair and, looking into a slot machine, sees clock-work puppets come to life. He and the puppets, now ballet dancers, interpret the various stages in wool production in terms of ballet. The film features dancer and choreographer, Harold Turner, and the Saddlers Wells Ballet Company.
